title: A Bug’s Desire to Survive - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong to Stronger   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   World Hopping
author: 雪原幽灵
description:
She is a bug, but she can’t let Tiandao find out that she is a bug.

Travel through different worlds, protect the weak son of luck from the calamity of heaven, and be a winner in life by the way.

Female lead: I can save any passerby, but I can’t save the male lead.

Male lead: ? ? ? What the hell?!>
